mapper.select: select * from cms_menu order by sort, id
select distinct m.* from cms_menu m inner join cms_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id inner join cms_admin_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.admin_id = #{adminId}
